job.title: Operations Engineer, Contractor Private Cloud (VMware)
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtltugtOperations Engineer Contractor Private Cloud VMwareltugtltstronggtltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtSupport the VMware IaaS platform and supporting infrastructure across the globe and ensure consistent availabilityltligtltligtThis includesltligtltligtUsing existing automation tools to perform daytoday operations dutiesltligtltligtDevelop automation to continue to drive proactive detection and remediation of issuesltligtltligtIdentify and tackle hardwaresoftware issues with vendorsltligtltligtRespond to inquiries and requests from other teamsltligtltligtFacilitate ticket creation and ticket assignmentltligtltligtEnforce change control processesltligtltligtMaintain good documentation and templatesltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtRequirementsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt5 years of experience supporting a 24x7 production environmentltligtltligt5 years of experience building and maintaining VMware vSphere 6x platformsltligtltligt3 years coding PythonltligtltligtHave working experience with Ansible git Jenkins Atlassian productsltligtltligtOther QualificationsltligtltligtExperience and knowledge in Linux support and administrationltligtltligtExperience running a fleet of servers FC switches and storageltligtltligtExperience with HashiCorp Vault is a plusltligtltligtMust possess excellent written and verbal skillsltligtltulgt
